overview: Jailppulli is a 1957 Indian Malayalam film, directed and produced by P Subramaniam. Gopi jail breaks to help his sick mother. But his mother succumbs to the disease and dies. He started to live a new life with a new name.. Ravi.  The film stars Prem Nazir, Miss Kumari in lead roles. The film had musical score by C Ramachandran, SM Subbaiah Naidu.
title: Jailppulli
